## **Overview**  

JSopX™ relies on a carefully curated stack of technologies, each chosen to ensure optimal compatibility, performance, and maintainability. Ensuring you have the correct versions of these tools installed is critical for successful collaboration and consistent results across projects. 

From development frameworks like ASP.NET Core to front-end build tools such as Angular CLI and Vite, each plays a vital role in creating a unified and powerful ecosystem. By adhering to these requirements, you’ll eliminate friction and maximize productivity.

## Prerequisites

To build and run the **Jason Silvestri Open Project EXperiences (JSopX™) JSopX™**, ensure the following are installed:

- [Windows (v 10+)]
- [Visual Studio (v 17.14.21)]
- [.NET Framework (v 9.2.1)]
- [ASP.NET Core (v 9.2.1)]
- [.NET Core Blazor (v 9.2.1)]
- [.Net Core Maui Hybrid (v 9.2.1)]
- [Node (v 20.14.0)]
- [npm (v 10.8.1)]
- [Bootstrap (v 5.3.8)]
- [Angular CLI (v 18.0.3)]
- [React (v 18.2.0)]
- [Vue (v 3.4.21)]
- [Vite (v 5.2.8)]
- [Python (v 3.12.3x+)]
- [Bash (v 5.x+)]
- [Powershell (v 7.x+)]

---

> Anytime we use a template to create a Self Health project, we immediately need to perform any latest updates, by going to the Solution -> Right Click -> and choose `Manage Nuget Packages`

---

## Blank Solution Visual Studio Template

**Purpose:** template is used as a starting point for creating a new solution without any predefined projects or files.

**Tags**: `C#`, `ASP.NET Core`

**Read More:** [Blank Solution Template]

[`⇧ Back to Top`](#table-of-contents)

---

## Website Visual Studio Template

**Purpose:** template is used to create a Visual Studio container for an existing website, and/or features we create that are often considered `tools`, `scripts`, etc., where Visual Studio Solutions complain about being in the root directory of projects. An example would be some of the Node features we have worked on in the past.

**Tags**: `C#`, `ASP.NET Core`

**Read More:** [Website App Template]

[`⇧ Back to Top`](#table-of-contents)

---

## ASP.NET Core Web App Visual Studio Template

**Purpose:** template is commonly used for building web applications and services, including RESTful APIs and dynamic web pages, using Razor Pages.

**Tags**: `C#`, `ASP.NET Core`

**Read More:** [ASP.NET Core Web App Template]

[`⇧ Back to Top`](#table-of-contents)

---

## Console App Visual Studio Template

**Purpose:** template is often used for background services, utilities, and tools that support the main application(s).

**Tags**: `C#`, `ASP.NET Core`

**Read More:** [Console App Template]

[`⇧ Back to Top`](#table-of-contents)

---

## Class Library Visual Studio Template

**Purpose:** template is used to create reusable components, services, and utilities that can be shared across multiple projects within the JSopX™ ecosystem.

**Tags**: `C#`, `ASP.NET Core`

**Read More:** [Class Library Template]


[`⇧ Back to Top`](#table-of-contents)

---

## Razor Class Library Visual Studio Template

**Purpose:** template is used to create reusable UI components, layouts, and views that can be shared across multiple projects.

**Tags**: `C#`, `ASP.NET Core`

**Read More:** [Razor Class Library Template]

[`⇧ Back to Top`](#table-of-contents)

---

## Asp.NET Core Web API Visual Studio Template

**Purpose:** template is used to create reusable UI components, layouts, and views that can be shared across multiple projects.

**Tags**: `C#`, `ASP.NET Core`

**Read More:** [Asp.NET Core Web API Template]

[`⇧ Back to Top`](#table-of-contents)

---

## Angular and ASP.NET Core Visual Studio Template

**Purpose:** template is used for building dynamic, component-based UIs for client-side applications in Angular that interact with ASP.NET Core server-side secure backends.

**Tags**: `C#`, `ASP.NET Core`, `TypeScript` `Angular CLI`

**Read More:** [Angular and ASP.NET Core Template]

[`⇧ Back to Top`](#table-of-contents)

---

## React and ASP.NET Core Visual Studio Template

**Purpose:** template is used for building dynamic, component-based UIs for client-side applications in React that interact with ASP.NET Core server-side secure backends.

**Tags**: `C#`, `ASP.NET Core`, `TypeScript` `React`

**Read More:** [React and ASP.NET Core Template]

[`⇧ Back to Top`](#table-of-contents)

---

## Vue and ASP.NET Core Visual Studio Template

**Purpose:** template is used for building dynamic, component-based UIs for client-side applications in Vue that interact with ASP.NET Core server-side secure backends.

**Tags**: `C#`, `ASP.NET Core`, `TypeScript` `Vue`

**Read More:** [Vue and ASP.NET Core Template]

[`⇧ Back to Top`](#table-of-contents)

---

## Blazor Web App Visual Studio Template

**Purpose:** template is used for building interactive Blazor web UIs using C#, enabling full-stack development with .NET technologies.

**Tags**: `C#`, `Linux`, `macOS` `Windows`, `Blazor`, `Cloud`, `Web`

**Read More:** [Blazor Web App Template]

[`⇧ Back to Top`](#table-of-contents)

---

## .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid and Web App Visual Studio Template

**Purpose:** template is used for Cross-platform MAUI Hybrid App and Web Multi App Project Library (Windows, Android, iOS, macOS, and Web).

**Read More:** [.NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid and Web App Template]

[`⇧ Back to Top`](#table-of-contents)

---

## .NET MAUI Class Library Visual Studio Template

**Purpose:** template is used for Cross-platform MAUI Hybrid App and Web Class Library Project Resources (Windows, Android, iOS, macOS, and Web).

**Tags**: `C#`, `Android`, `Blazor`, `Blazor Hybrid`, `iOS`, `Mac Catalyst`, `macOS`, `MAUI`, `Mobile`, `Windows`, `Tizen`

**Read More:** [.NET MAUI Class Library Template]

[`⇧ Back to Top`](#table-of-contents)

---

## .NET MAUI Multi-Project App Visual Studio Template

**Purpose:** template is used for Cross-platform MAUI Hybrid App and Web Multi App Project Library (Windows, Android, iOS, macOS, and Web).

**Tags**: `C#`, `Android`, `iOS`, `Mac Catalyst`, `macOS`, `MAUI`, `Mobile`, `Windows`

**Read More:** [.NET MAUI Multi-Project App Template]
